titles.title: To provide for the relief of hospitals treating rural populations under the current calculation of the wage index modifier for the prospective payment under Medicare.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary: 10/7/1994--Introduced. Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act with respect to prospective payment to hospitals for inpatient hospital services to require updates to a specified factor in the calculation of the wage index modifier for certain hospitals in rural and urban areas.
